headline.main: PATH TO MOSCOW EASY, SAYS BERLIN; Good Roads, Weak Resistance Held to Doom the Capital -- Third Thrust Reported PATH TO MOSCOW EASY, SAYS BERLIN

lead_paragraph: BERLIN, Oct. 13 -- German armored units were in the town of Kaluga, southwest of Moscow, and along the Vyazma-Moscow highway they were about the same distance -- some ninety miles -- from the Soviet capital, it was reported in unofficial but well-informed quarters here tonight.
